about_the_game:
By purchasing DLC, you will get extra content in the game 100 Pirate Cats.
Get an extra level with 100 more adorable cats!

DLC INCLUDE:
  • 1x New level
  • 1x Pirate Key (Consumable. Consumed by opening the lock)
  • 10x Extra Hints (Consumable. Consumed when using hints during the game)
  • 100x New Hidden Cats
